calculateAxesMinimumAndMaximumValues() - Method in class linefit.GraphArea
Calculates the lengths of the axes based on the data points, unless the user has overridden this functionality, so that they are all on screen
calculateChiSquared(double, double) - Method in class linefit.FitAlgorithms.LinearFitStrategy
Calculates the Chi Squared(^2) value for the inputed slope and intercept.The DataSet's Chi Squared measures the average distance of the points away from the fitted line
calculateGraphAreaRightSpacing(double) - Method in class linefit.GraphArea
calculates the graph area's righ side spacing based on whether or not the power is displayed and the length of the last tick label

checkForZeroErrorValues() - Method in class linefit.DataSet
Checks the x and y errors/uncertainties for this DataSet and makes sure none of them are 0 because it will throw off the fit algorithms
